open.author.name: Marek Marecki
message:
Simplify arithmetic ops

There is no need to provide separate int8, uint16 etc. types.
The fixed-bit-width signed/unsigned integer issue will be handed by the `bits`
type.
Simple arithmetic should just involve integers and floats.
More advanced use-cases can be implemented as non-Viua-native types.
